50#ifndef AM_HAL_TPIU_H

60//*****************************************************************************
61//
63//
64//*****************************************************************************
65#define TPI_SPPR_TXMODE_UART 2 // SWO NRZ (UART)
66#define TPI_SPPR_TXMODE_MANCHESTER 1 // SWO Manchester
67#define TPI_SPPR_TXMODE_PARALLEL 0 // Parallel port
68
69#define TPI_CSPSR_CWIDTH_1BIT 1 // 1-bit trace port
70#define TPI_CSPSR_CWIDTH_2BIT 2 // 2-bit trace port
71#define TPI_CSPSR_CWIDTH_4BIT 4 // 4-bit trace port
72
73#ifndef TPI_ACPR_SWOSCALER_Pos
74#define TPI_ACPR_SWOSCALER_Pos 0U
75#define TPI_ACPR_SWOSCALER_Msk (0xFFFFUL /*<< TPI_ACPR_SWOSCALER_Pos*/)
76#endif
77
78//*****************************************************************************
79//
82//
83//*****************************************************************************
84#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_57600 (115200 / 2)
85#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_115200 (115200 * 1)
86#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_230400 (115200 * 2)
87#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_460800 (115200 * 4)
88#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_250000 (1000000 / 4)
89#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_500000 (1000000 / 2)
90#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_1M (1000000 * 1)
91#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_2M (1000000 * 2)
92#define AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_DEFAULT (AM_HAL_TPIU_BAUD_1M)
94

107 uint32_t ui32PinProtocol,
108 uint32_t ui32SWOscaler);
